item.title: Submissions open next week (July 1st) on @FilmFreeway for the 7th iteration of Ax Wound Film Festival -planned for September 2023 - at the historic and stunning Coolidge Corner Theatre @thecoolidge in Brookline, MA! Stay tuned for details! #AxWound2023

item.title: RT by @AxWoundFilmFest: 2021 actually had some highlights: Trouble Every Day released @DevilsAdBooks Presented @finalgirlsfest & @cine_excess Joined conversations @TheFOFIF & @AxWoundFilmFest Guested @FinalGirlsFeast Intro. Trouble Every Day @BrooklynHorror screening Finalised chapters for 2 edited vols
item.dc:creator: @final_fatale
item.description:
2021 actually had some highlights:
Trouble Every Day released @DevilsAdBooks
Presented @finalgirlsfest & @cine_excess
Joined conversations @TheFOFIF & @AxWoundFilmFest
Guested @FinalGirlsFeast
Intro. Trouble Every Day @BrooklynHorror screening
Finalised chapters for 2 edited vols
